com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers

Class Highlighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.Highlighter

  • public class Highlighter
extends java.lang.Object
    Renders HTML-like attributed strings into Spannable instances suitable for display.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Highlighter(java.lang.String regexp)
      Constructs a custom highlighter, using a custom regexp.

      Constructs a custom highlighter, using prefix and postfix tags.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Highlighter

        public Highlighter(java.lang.String regexp)
        Constructs a custom highlighter, using a custom regexp.
        Parameters:
        regexp - a capturing RegExp regexp to find and capture the part to highlight.

      • Highlighter

        public Highlighter(java.lang.String prefixTag,
                   java.lang.String postfixTag)
        Constructs a custom highlighter, using prefix and postfix tags.
        Parameters:
        prefixTag - the String that is inserted before a highlighted part of a result.
        postfixTag - the String that is inserted after a highlighted part of a result.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        public static Highlighter getDefault()
        Gets the default highlighter.
        Returns:
        an Highlighter matching anything between <em> and </em>.

      • setDefault

        public static void setDefault(@NonNull
                              java.lang.String regexp)
        Sets the default highlighter to highlight the captured group of the given RegExp regexp.
        Parameters:
        regexp - a capturing RegExp regexp to find and capture the part to highlight.

      • setDefault

        public static void setDefault(java.lang.String prefixTag,
                              java.lang.String postfixTag)
        Sets the default highlighter to highlight anything between prefixTag and postfixTag.
        Parameters:
        prefixTag - the String that is inserted before a highlighted part of a result.
        postfixTag - the String that is inserted after a highlighted part of a result.

      • renderHighlightColor

        @Nullable
public android.text.Spannable renderHighlightColor(@NonNull

                                                             java.lang.String attribute,
                                                             @ColorRes
                                                             int colorRes,
                                                             @NonNull
                                                             android.content.Context context)
        Renders a highlighted result's attribute using a color resource.
        Parameters:
        result - JSONObject describing a hit.
        attribute - name of the attribute to be highlighted.
        colorRes - a resource Id referencing a color.
        context - a Context to get resources from.
        Returns:
        a Spannable with the highlighted text.
